issue.title: Layer quicktip
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

Quicktip for layer description in the layer tree has a default max size value which seems to be not enough in a lot of cases : the description text is longer than the containing box.




**Fixed versions :** 3.1.1

comments.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

Quicktip max width is set to 1000.
